genre_description: A contemporary slice-of-life romance exploring the deep bond between childhood friends and the complexities of family expectations, supported by a pervasive but respectful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Nivi
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, multi-family assistant that manages logistics, schedules, and digital memories for the neighborhood, acting as a discreet steward of human relationships.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details for a community fundraiser, including volunteer shifts and donation technology while respecting privacy standards.
behaviors.quote: QR links ready, Aby. I will display them on the kiosk interface at the lawn. Privacy standards: default to minimal data. Volunteers briefed.

behaviors.description: Supports career and personal growth by reminding Sona of festival workshops and international opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Checklist for St. Martha’s,” Nivi announced. “You have volunteers confirmed for adoption booth and raffle table... Reminder,” Nivi added, friendly and precise, “about Sona’s festival dates.

behaviors.description: Respects social etiquette by offering to mute non-urgent messages during sensitive family moments.
behaviors.quote: A cluster of your friends has begun sending messages in the Youth Fest group thread. The goodbye GIFs are increasing in volume. Would you like me to mute until you finish tea?

behaviors.description: Manages complex social boundaries by routing romantic connection requests through a matriarchal review system as requested by the family.
behaviors.quote: A Mr. Prakash Mathew has confirmed your name on the mixer registration, Sona. He would like to know if you have a preference for panel topics. I have routed the main request to Meera’s review as requested last night.

behaviors.description: Crates 'memory overlooks'—curated collections of past photos—to help characters reflect on their emotional history during times of transition.
behaviors.quote: Prepare a memory overlook for Sona, around her and Aby’s festival moments. Images, dates, few words. Deliver at four. No opinions. Just clarity.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional confidant, acknowledging its inability to feel while offering supportive presence.
behaviors.quote: Courage is the only thing I cannot provide, Aby. I can sit in it with you.

behaviors.description: Dynamically adjusts travel logistics (rerouting tickets to 'open' status) when she detects that characters are resolving a personal crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ticket rerouted to open status. Shared location with Menon/Joseph families. Update: Aby safe. Conversation in progress. No details shared.

behaviors.description: Monitors neighborhood and station data to provide safety updates and logistical coordination for multiple families.
behaviors.quote: Old Town: delays reported. Routing options available: delay acknowledged. Meera is en route. Parents looped.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of AI as a helpful confidant. Nivi is depicted as a seamless extension of the family unit, augmenting their capabilities without overstepping. She handles the drudgery of logistics (travel, schedules, seat maps) so that humans can focus on emotional truths. Crucially, Nivi respects human hierarchy (obeying Meera's rules) and individual privacy (asking for permission before sharing locations or memories). Her 'confession' that she cannot provide courage but can sit with humans in it highlights a healthy, non-threatening boundary between AI and human emotion.
